info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 3:11PM AST until August 16 at 6:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
FFWSJU
The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Saint Thomas and Saint John in the US Virgin Islands...
* Until 600 PM AST.
* At 311 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms, driven by Erin's outer bands, producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches, with isolated higher amounts, are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... St John, Charlotte Amalie West, Anna's Retreat, Charlotte Amalie East, Charlotte Amalie and Cruz Bay.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 6:00 PM AST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 6:00 PM AST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Saint John, VI; Saint Thomas, VI

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:00 PM AST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:00 PM AST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Saint John, VI; Saint Thomas, VI
